ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Another issue...
ygData.msgSnippet: There is no more support of Windows 95 or DirectX 8.0. You will need to download and install DirectX 8.1
ygData.messageBody:
There is no more support of Windows 95 or DirectX 8.0.

You will need to download and install DirectX 8.1

At 05:50 AM 12/5/2001 -0800, you wrote:
>So, which one is it? Do I need directx8.0 or directx8.1? I still do not have
>SoL yet, but I should have it by weeks end, BUT I want to log onto EQ to
>check and see if Dain has spawned in Icewell Keep. I've been waiting for
>over a week now to see this short little sob and he has yet to show his
>face. I need him to spawn to complete my 9th Coldain Ring quest. On my way
>out to work this morning I was going to see if Dain was up, so I tried to
>log in real fast, but I couldn't get the patch to start. I didn't have any
>time to play EQ last night. Yesterday at work, I tore myself away from my
>work and emailed to my home address DirectX8 and my newest sound and video
>drivers. I just need to install them now.
>
>Ok, so now for my question, is the reason I couldn't log on this morning
>because I have not downloaded DirectX yet? If so, which DirectX do I need
>8.0 or 8.1?
>
>Thanks for the help! My gnome warrior thanks you also!
